DOC.brief_summary: A comparison of the efficacy of APD421 and placebo when combined with a standard anti-emetic in the prevention of PONV in patients at high risk of Post-operative Nausea and Vomiting (PONV).
DOC.brief_title: Phase IIIb Study of APD421 in Combination as PONV Prophylaxis
